00033 CTransliterationButton::CTransliterationButton(QWidget *parent, const char *name ) : KToolBarButton(DSB_ICON, 0,parent,name) {

00039

00052 
00054 void CTransliterationButton::populateMenu(){
00055   m_popup->clear();
00056   m_popup->insertTitle(i18n("Transliteration"));
00057 
00058   OptionsList options = CPointers::backend()->transliterator()->getOptionValues();
00059   OptionsList::iterator it;
00060   for (it = options.begin(); it != options.end(); ++it) {
00061     m_popup->insertItem(QString::fromLatin1((*it).c_str()));
00062   }
00063 }

00069 CDisplaySettingsButton::CDisplaySettingsButton(CSwordBackend::DisplayOptionsBool *displaySettings, CSwordBackend::FilterOptionsBool *moduleSettings, const ListCSwordModuleInfo& useModules,QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00070     : KToolBarButton(DSB_ICON, 0, parent, name)
00071 {
00072     m_displaySettings = displaySettings;
00073     m_moduleSettings = moduleSettings;
00074     m_modules = useModules;
00075 
00076     m_popup = new KPopupMenu(this); 
00077     setPopup(m_popup);
00078     setPopupDelay(0);
00079 
00080     connect(m_popup, SIGNAL(activated(int)), this, SLOT(optionToggled(int)));
00081     populateMenu();
00082 }
00083 
00084 void CDisplaySettingsButton::reset(const ListCSwordModuleInfo& useModules){
00085     m_modules = useModules;
00086     populateMenu();
00087 //  if (!populateMenu())
00088 //      setEnabled(false);
00089 //  else
00090 //      setEnabled(true);
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 void CDisplaySettingsButton::optionToggled(int ID){
00095     m_popup->setItemChecked( ID, !(m_popup->isItemChecked(ID)));
00096     if (!m_popup->text(ID).isEmpty())
00097       *(m_dict[m_popup->text(ID)]) =  m_popup->isItemChecked(ID);
00098     emit sigChanged();
00099 }
00100 
00102 int CDisplaySettingsButton::populateMenu(){
00103 
00104     int ret = 0;
00105 
00106     m_popup->clear();
00107     m_popup->insertTitle(i18n("Display options"));
00108     m_popup->setCheckable(true);
00109 
00110   ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Use linebreaks after each verse"), &m_displaySettings->lineBreaks, true);
00111     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show versenumbers"), &m_displaySettings->verseNumbers, true);
00112 
00113     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show headings"),  &m_moduleSettings->headings,
00114         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::headings));    
00115     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show footnotes"), &m_moduleSettings->footnotes,
00116         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::footnotes ));
00117     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show Strong's Numbers"), &m_moduleSettings->strongNumbers,
00118         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::strongNumbers ));
00119 
00120     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show morphologic tags"),&m_moduleSettings->morphTags,
00121         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::morphTags ));
00122     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show lemmas"),&m_moduleSettings->lemmas,
00123         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::lemmas ));
00124     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show Hebrew vowel points"), &m_moduleSettings->hebrewPoints,
00125         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::hebrewPoints ));
00126     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show Hebrew cantillation marks"), &m_moduleSettings->hebrewCantillation,
00127         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::hebrewCantillation ));
00128     ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show Greek accents"), &m_moduleSettings->greekAccents,
00129         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::greekAccents ));
00130     
00131   ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Use alternative textual variant"), &m_moduleSettings->textualVariants,
00132         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::textualVariants ));
00133   ret += addMenuEntry(i18n("Show scripture cross-references"), &m_moduleSettings->scriptureReferences,
00134         isOptionAvailable(CSwordBackend::scriptureReferences ));
00135 
00136     return ret;
00137 }
00138 
00140 int CDisplaySettingsButton::addMenuEntry( const QString name, const bool* option, const bool available){
00141     if (available){
00142         m_dict.insert( name, option);
00143         m_popup->setItemChecked(m_popup->insertItem( name ), *option );
00144         return 1;
00145     }
00146     return 0;
00147 }
00148 
00149 bool CDisplaySettingsButton::isOptionAvailable( const CSwordBackend::FilterOptions option){
00150     bool ret = false;
00151     for (m_modules.first(); m_modules.current(); m_modules.next())
00152         ret = ret || m_modules.current()->has(option);
00153     return ret;
00154 }
00155 
00157 const int CDisplaySettingsButton::menuItemCount(){
00158     return m_popup->count();
00159 }
00160 
00162 void CDisplaySettingsButton::setItemStatus( const int index, const bool checked ){
00163     const int ID = m_popup->idAt(index);
00164     m_popup->setItemChecked(ID, checked);
00165     const QString text = m_popup->text(ID);
00166     if (m_dict[text])
00167       *(m_dict[text]) = checked;
00168 }
00169 
00171 const bool CDisplaySettingsButton::itemStatus( const int index ){
00172     return m_popup->isItemChecked( m_popup->idAt(index) );
00173 }
00174 
00176 void CDisplaySettingsButton::setChanged(){
00177     emit sigChanged();  
00178 }
